articles.title: SPA of DPRK Meets
articles.content:
SPA of DPRK Meets
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The 2nd Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday. 
					 It was attended by deputies to the SPA.
					
					 Officials of Party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions and those in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media attended it as observers.
					
					 The session discussed the following agenda items: "1. On the work of the DPRK Cabinet in Juche 98 (2009) and its tasks for Juche 99 (2010)", "2. On the results of the implementation of the DPRK state budget for Juche 98 (2009) and its state budget for Juche 99 (2010)", "3. On the adoption of the ordinance of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly 'On revising some provisions of the DPRK Socialist Constitution'" and "4. Organizational matter".
					
					 Deputy Kim Yong Il, premier of the Cabinet, in a report on the first agenda item said that last year the indomitable mental power of all the people of the country and production potential were fully displayed and, as a result, the gross industrial output value markedly grew as compared with that in 2008. This year the Cabinet will boost the production of consumer goods and grain by leaps and bounds by putting spurs to the development of light industry and agriculture once again and reenergize the overall production by giving definite priority to the production of electricity, coal, iron and steel and railway transport and, at the same time, energetically organize and conduct the campaign for a great surge with main emphasis on stepping up the technological upgrading and modernization of the national economy, he added.
					
					 Deputy Pak Su Gil, vice-premier of the Cabinet and minister of Finance, in a report on the second agenda item said that last year's state budget revenue was overfulfilled 1.7 percent and the state budgetary expenditure was implemented at 99.8 percent. 
					
					 He noted that the plan for state budgetary revenue for this year is expected to increase 6.3 percent over last year while the plan for state budgetary expenditure is expected to grow 8.3 percent.
					
					 Speakers at the session pointed out that the Cabinet's work last year and the implementation of its state budget were properly reviewed and summed up, this year's tasks were clearly laid down and its state budget was correctly shaped. They expressed full support and approval of them. 
					
					 They manifested their resolution to successfully put into practice the Party's intention and idea of augmenting the country's political and military potentials in every way and bringing about a dramatic turn in improving the people's standard of living in this significant year marking the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Worker's Party of Korea. 
					
					 The session adopted the decision of the SPA of the DPRK "On approving the report on the work of the DPRK Cabinet and the results of the implementation of the DPRK state budget for Juche 98 (2009)" and the ordinance of the SPA of the DPRK "On the DPRK state budget for Juche 99 (2010)."
					
					 Also adopted there was the ordinance of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly "On revising some provisions of the DPRK Socialist Constitution".
					
					 Deputy Pyon Yong Rip was elected secretary general of the Presidium of the SPA to fill vacancy and Deputy Jang Pyong Gyu was appointed as director of the Supreme Public Prosecutors Office at the session.

articles.title: On Last Year's Work and This Year's Tasks of Cabinet
articles.content:
On Last Year's Work and This Year's Tasks of Cabinet
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, delivered a report on the work of the DPRK Cabinet in Juche 98 (2009) and its tasks for Juche 99 (2010) at the 2nd Session of the 12th SPA held on Friday.
					 According to the report, thanks to the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea last year witnessed a chain of eye-opening events, a proof of tremendous political, military and economic potentials of the DPRK, and the translation of the people's ideals into realities for which they longed to see, weathering out all sorts of difficulties and trials.
					
					 The indomitable mental power of all the people of the country and the production potential were fully displayed last year through the high-pitched 150-day and 100-day campaigns and, as a result, the gross industrial output value remarkably grew as compared with that in 2008.
					
					 Signal progress registered in putting the national economy on a Juche-oriented basis was one of the most spectacular successes made in economic construction last year.
					
					 The Juche iron production system was rounded off and the mass-production of vinalon, the fiber of our own invention, brought about a stirring reality.
					
					 Last year witnessed the further reinforcement of the production foundations of the overall national economy and dynamic progress in placing the major industrial sectors on a modern and CNC basis and successes representing the level of latest science and technology made in the development of space technology, nuclear technology, CNC technology and bio-engineering.
					
					 The DPRK made dynamic advance, foiling the foolish sanctions of the imperialist reactionaries and their followers with revolutionary faith, indomitable mental power and the spirit of self-reliance under the uplifted banner of Songun. As a result, it did everything it had determined to do.
					
					 The reporter went on:
					
					 This year the Cabinet will boost the production of consumer goods and grain by leaps and bounds by putting spurs to the development of light industry and agriculture once again and reenergize the overall production by giving definite priority to the production of electricity, coal, iron and steel and railway transport and, at the same time, energetically organize and conduct the campaign for a great surge with main emphasis on stepping up the technological upgrading and modernization of the national economy.
					
					 The Cabinet will arouse all the consumer goods production bases to wage a high-pitched drive to keep production going at a high rate so as to radically boost the production of consumer goods including textiles, shoes, underwear, essential foodstuffs and daily necessities and continue vigorously pushing forward the technological upgrading and modernization of light industrial domain.
					
					 This year the Cabinet will thoroughly implement the Workers' Party of Korea's policy on agricultural revolution including the policy of bringing about a radical turn in seed selection, the policy of double-cropping and the policies of effecting signal turns in potato farming and soya bean cultivation by focusing state efforts on the agricultural field.
					
					 The Cabinet will make sure that the production is kept going on a high level at the chemical factories to ensure satisfactory production and supply of chemical fiber, plastics, chemical fertilizers, agrochemicals and other things needed for the fields of light industry and agriculture and sectors related to the chemical industry provide raw and other materials for the production of consumer goods and grain in a responsible manner.
					
					 It will guide the fishery domain to decisively increase aquatic products so that people may receive substantial benefits, the field of food procurement and administration to put the supply of food to the residents on a normal footing and the field of commerce to improve the commodity supply.
					
					 The Cabinet will see to it that the popular policies including the social insurance and pension system, the system of recuperation at rest homes and sanatoria and the premium system for disabled soldiers are satisfactorily enforced.
					
					 The Cabinet will make sure that the four priority sectors including metal industry bring about a boost in production in "Huichon Speed", a new Chollima speed, and dynamically accelerate the on-going general offensive for improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 It will guide the field of metal industry to actively promote the technological upgrading and modernization of the production processes with main emphasis on more perfectly rounding off the Juche iron production system and producing steel without using coke and, at the same time, make the most effective use of the existing production potential.
					
					 The field of power industry will be guided to put all power-generating equipment at full capacity and the field of coal industry to increase the coal production capacity under a long-term plan. The field of railway transport will be led to boost the railway freight turnover and, at the same time, reinforce the material and technical foundation of railway transport.
					
					 The Cabinet will make sure that the major industrial sectors including machine-building, mining and building materials industries and timber industry effect a surge in production to make a positive contribution to the improvement of the people's standard of living and economic progress.
					
					The Cabinet will see to it that new "Pyongyang speed" is created in the major construction projects and the construction of 100,000 flats and "an era of Pyongyang prosperity" in the era of Songun ushered in and cities of bliss and socialist ideal villages in the era of Songun are built across the country and the appearance of the country undergo a radical change.
					
					 It will make sure that the core basic technology and the major technical engineering in the field of scientific research are rapidly developed and technology is closely combined with production to boost the nation's own capacity to develop technology and products and wage a bold campaign to push back the frontiers of the latest science and technology.
					
					 The Cabinet will expand and develop foreign trade and conduct economic and technical cooperation with other countries in a bold and big manner.
					
					 It will strictly adhere to the socialist principles in economic guidance and management and settle all issues arising in the economic management in a creative manner on the principles of self-reliance and profitability.
					
					 The Cabinet will make sure that education and public health are improved and strengthened, a radical turn is effected in literature and arts in the era of Songun and a new "sports myth" of Songun Korea is created in international games.
					
					 The reporter stressed the need for all the sectors and units to carry out their economic assignments ahead of schedule and thus proudly participate in the grand festival of October with the honor of being victors.

articles.title: Report on Implementation of 2009 Budget and 2010 Budget
articles.content:
Report on Implementation of 2009 Budget and 2010 Budget
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Deputy Pak Su Gil, vice-premier and minister of Finance, delivered a report on the results of the implementation of the DPRK state budget for last year and its state budget for this year at the 2nd Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly held on Friday.
					 According to the report, the state budget for last year was successfully implemented and, as a result, the state budgetary revenue was overfulfilled 1.7 per cent, an increase of 7 per cent over the previous year.
					
					 Ministries, national institutions, management bureaus and complexes overfulfilled the national plans for budgetary revenue and all provinces, cities and counties across the country also overfulfilled their plans for local budgetary revenue.
					
					 Last year's plan for state budgetary expenditure was carried out at 99.8 per cent.
					
					 An investment from the state budget was focused on the development of metal industry while a huge financial allocation was made for the power and coal industries and the railway transport.
					
					  8.6 per cent more funds than the previous year were spent for capital construction and expenditure was increased for agriculture and light industry.
					
					 A 7.2 per cent greater financial disbursement than the previous year was made for the field of science and technology, surpassing the level of the latest science and technology in domains of space technology, nuclear technology and CNC technology and putting the key industries of the national economy on a high scientific and technological basis.
					
					 A large amount of fund went to the field of cultural construction and 15.8 per cent of the total state budgetary expenditure was spent for national defence.
					
					 The reporter said that the scale of revenue and expenditure in the state budget for this year has been set on the principle of improving the people's standard of living to meet the requirements of the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on conducting a great offensive to bring about a decisive turn in the above-said work.
					
					 This year's plan for state budgetary revenue is expected to grow 6.3 per cent over last year. The revenue from the profits of state enterprises, the main source of state budgetary revenue, is expected to go up 7.7 per cent over last year, that from the profits of cooperative organizations 4.2 per cent, that from the fixed asset depreciation 2.5 per cent, that from real estate rent 2 per cent and that from social insurance 1.9 per cent.
					
					 This year's plan for state budgetary expenditure is expected to show an 8.3 per cent increase over last year.
					
					 The spending for the light industry is expected to go up 10.1 per cent, that for agriculture 9.4 per cent and that for metal, power and coal industries and railway transport 7.3 per cent as compared with last year.
					
					 The expenditure for the machine-building industry is expected to go up and an 8.5 per cent bigger financial allocation will be made for scientific researches and the introduction of new technologies.
					
					 A 6.2 per cent bigger financial disbursement than last year is expected to be made to more successfully enforce the popular policies, a proof of the advantages of Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses.
					
					 15.8 per cent of the total state budgetary expenditure for this year is expected to be spent for national defence.
					
					 It is expected that a large amount of educational aid fund and stipends will be sent for the children of Koreans in Japan this year, too.
					
					  In order to successfully implement this year's state budget, all domains and units of the national economy should work out enterprising and realistic business strategy and management strategy and tenaciously carry them out by relying on a high degree of mental power of the producer masses and thus fulfill the plans for budgetary revenue without fail, stressed the reporter.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Dismisses US Nuclear Plan
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Dismisses US Nuclear Plan
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA Friday as regards the U.S. publication of its "Nuclear Posture Review":
					 The review made public on April 6 proves that the present U.S. administration still regards nukes as a mainstay in carrying out its strategy for world domination.
					
					 President Obama blustered that the U.S. will not use or threaten to use nuclear weapons against non-nuclear weapons states that comply with the provisions of NPT but exception is made for countries such as the DPRK and Iran. This proves that the present U.S. policy towards the DPRK is nothing different from the hostile policy pursued by the Bush administration at the outset of its office during which it was hell-bent on posing a nuclear threat to the DPRK after designating it as a "target of preemptive nuclear strike."
					
					 By releasing the review the U.S. completely backpedaled its commitment made in the September 19 Joint Statement of the six-party talks that it has no intention to attack or invade the DPRK with nuclear weapons or conventional weapons, and again chilled the hard-won atmosphere for the resumption of the talks.
					
					 As far as the NPT is concerned, it is not a treaty to last long because it is a transitional step to prevent nuclear proliferation till the world is denuclearized. The DPRK pulled out of the treaty after going through legitimate and legal procedures as the U.S. more undisguisedly used the NPT as a lever for isolating and stifling it.
					
					 The DPRK manufactured nukes, not prompted by any nuclear ambition. It produced them for the purpose of deterring the U.S. attack and defending its sovereignty and right to existence because the latter posed substantial nuclear threat to it after singling it out as "a target of preemptive nuclear attack." The DPRK has so far sincerely implemented its international obligation as a responsible nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is the invariable goal of the DPRK. If the peninsula and the rest of the world are to be denuclearized, the U.S. should stop such hostile acts as trampling down upon other countries' sovereignty and right to existence, pursuant to its policy of strength based on nuclear supremacy. What is most urgent is for the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK in practice, not with an empty talk, and take a confidence-building measure.
					
					 As long as the U.S. nuclear threat persists, the DPRK will increase and update various type nuclear weapons as its deterrent in such a manner as it deems necessary in the days ahead. 
					
					 The DPRK is fully capable of doing so. It is the U.S. that gives the former ground and justification to do so. 
					
					 The U.S. should know that gone are the days never to return when the DPRK was only exposed to the blackmail and pressure slapped by the former on the strength of its nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Ten-day Film Shows Open
articles.content:
Ten-day Film Shows Open
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Ten-day film shows were opened to commemorate the Day of the Sun in the DPRK.
					 Documentary films including "Finding Himself among People All His Life", "Fatherly Leader among Servicepersons", "Great Devotion (Year of Great Changes, 2009)" and feature films  such as "Star of Korea", "The Sun of the Nation", "Mt. Paektu" and "The Country I Saw" will be screened during the shows.
					
					 An opening ceremony was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday.
					
					 Similar film shows were opened in all provinces on the same day.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place across the country on Friday to celebrate the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission. 
					 Youth and students merrily danced to the tune of "Glory to General", "Confetti of Best Wishes" in the dancing places in Pyongyang including the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the April 25 House of Culture and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium. 
					
					 They presented beautiful dance in deep reverence for Kim Jong Il who has glorified the dignity and honor of Kim Il Sung's nation by pursuing the unique Songun politics and ushered in a remarkable era in which the people's ideals are translated into reality on this land. 
					
					 Such passionate and dynamic songs as "Pride of Youth", "Push Back the Frontiers of Latest Science" and "Let's Meet Each Other on the Front" reflecting the ardent zeal of young people to display wisdom and pluck in every difficult and labor-consuming site for building a thriving nation with firm confidence and optimism about sure victory added to the festive atmosphere of dancing parties.  
					
					 Similar dancing parties were held in different parts of the country including Sariwon, Hamhung, Chongjin, Kanggye and Wonsan on the same day. They showed well the revolutionary faith and militant stamina of young vanguard to glorify its honor as a shock brigade which plays a leading role in building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Seminar on Message of Kim Jong Il Held
articles.content:
Seminar on Message of Kim Jong Il Held
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A seminar of media persons on  "Journalists and Other Media Persons Are Buglers Sounding Advance in Dynamic Drive for Building a Great Prosperous and Powerful Nation," message of General Secretary Kim Jong Il to the participants of the national meeting of journalists and other media persons, was held at the Central Youth Hall Thursday.
					 It was attended by officials, journalists and editors in the field of media here.
					
					 The speakers said that the historic message Kim Jong Il sent to the participants of the national meeting on Feb. 21, Juche 99 (2010) serves as an inspiring banner helping the Juche-based media increase its might in the efforts to build a thriving nation.
					
					 They referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il in the message comprehensively and scientifically clarified the tasks facing the field of media of the Workers' Party of Korea at present and the ways to implement them. 
					
					 They explained that it is the primary and just task proceeding from the nature and basic mission of the media of the WPK and the requirements of the developing revolution to conduct a media offensive to demonstrate the solidity of the single-minded unity with the headquarters of the revolution as the core and the invincible might of socialism.
					
					 They stressed that for all the journalists and other media persons to strictly adhere to the Juche stand and the principles of popular character in media activities provides a sure guarantee for turning the above-said media into a powerful ideological weapon in the dynamic drive for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 They called upon all of them to bring about a creative surge in the media work, tightly wielding pens of the revolution, and thus fulfill the honorable mission and role as buglers sounding the advance in the dynamic drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Food Festival Ends
articles.content:
Food Festival Ends
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The 15th April Holiday Food Festival, which started at the People's Palace of Culture in Pyongyang on April 6 to mark Day of the Sun (President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary), closed on Thursday.
					Presented to the festival were more than 1,000 national and foreign dishes by 43 units selected through food contests in Pyongyang and local areas, as well as over 200 pieces of new cuisine information.
					
					 Diplomas and medals were conferred on such units as the Okryu Restaurant, Chongnyu Restaurant and Kanggye Chicken Entrails Soup Shop in Jagang Province, and individuals. Typical of the awarded dishes are steamed whole terrapin, smothered sturgeon spiced with soy sauce, wild vegetables salad mixed with green gram paste, smothered eel and hard-boiled chicken crest.
					
					 Jo Ui Yong, an official of the Korean Association of Cooks, told KCNA that such foreign dishes as pizza and spaghetti attracted attention of visitors. "The festival was very significant in improving people's living standard and diet," he said.
					
					 Jon Hye Suk, chef of the Chongnyu Restaurant, was satisfied at her dish of pig leg treated with oak tree smoke which won a special prize in the festival for its unique taste and flavor and for its easiness in preparation.
					
					 The festival took place, divided into exhibitions of provincial special food, famous dishes of catering establishments, typical national and foreign dishes and new cuisine information, skill contests and demonstrations of cooks and waiters and waitresses, seminar and the like.

articles.title: Korea Rich in Underground Resources
articles.content:
Korea Rich in Underground Resources
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Korea is abundant in underground resources.
					 Kim Hung Ju, a department director of the State Resources Development Guidance Bureau, told KCNA that useful minerals were found in nearly 80 percent of the territory.
					
					 There are billions of tons of iron ores, including magnetite and limonite. It is easy to mine them as they are deposited near the crust of the earth.
					
					 The country has also large deposits of gold, silver, copper, lead, zinc, cyanite, sillimanite, titanium, manganese, nickel, chrome and rutile.
					
					 Rare metallic minerals such as molybdenum, monazite, wolframite, beryl, zirconium and uranium are spread in different parts of the country.
					
					 In particular, rare earth minerals including fluorocarbonic cerium are inexhaustible in the country.
					
					 The country is also endowed with limestone, apatite, alunite, barite and other minerals used as raw materials in chemical and building materials industry, granite, marble, dolomite, phyllite and other natural stone resources and mica, asbestos, talc, diatomite, kaolin, bentonite and other nonmetallic minerals. 
					
					 Deposits of magnesite and graphite are as large as billions of tons respectively.
					
					 High-caloric coal resources are distributed in different areas of the country to provide favorable conditions for the economic development.
					
					 Up to now hundreds of kinds of minerals have been discovered in the country.

articles.title: Papers Observe Anniversary of Election as NDC Chairman
articles.content:
Papers Observe Anniversary of Election as NDC Chairman
Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Friday editorially observe the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that Kim Jong Il's election to the top post of the DPRK provided a fundamental guarantee for reliably inheriting and developing President Kim Il Sung's unique idea on state building and exploits and accomplishing the cause of the Korean revolution started in Mt. Paektu under the banner of the Juche idea and Songun.
					
					 The period during which he has led the DPRK after taking the important post as NDC chairman is an immortal revolutionary history as he has kept the lifeline of the country and the revolution and opened up a new era of building a thriving nation by dint of Songun, it says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership is consistent with the tireless activities conducted by him to hold Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the sun of Juche and the eternal President of the DPRK and successfully accomplish the President's cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 To the army and people of the DPRK, Kim Jong Il represents the symbol of mightiness and invincibility of Kim Il Sung's Korea and his Songun revolutionary leadership serves as the lifeblood of the country and nation.
					
					 It is thanks to his Songun leadership and the strong self-reliant defence capability that the DPRK has advanced under the banner of independence without any vacillation at the imperialist reactionaries' high-handed practices and pressure and their ceaseless aggression moves and persistent sanctions and blockade. 
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that the DPRK will as ever emerge victorious and rosy future is always in store for it as it has Kim Jong Il at the head of the party, the army and the state.

articles.title: Adherence to Inter-Korean Declaration Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Adherence to Inter-Korean Declaration Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement calling for strict implementation of the north-south joint declaration on April 3.
					 The statement noted that 62 years have passed since the inhabitants of Jeju Island kindled the torch of the April 3 Popular Resistance against the U.S. imperialists' moves to divide Korea into two, thus strikingly demonstrating the Korean nation's will for independent reunification.
					
					 The flames of the resistance, which erupted like a volcano to oppose the U.S. imperialists and the pro-American Syngman Rhee group's scheme for establishment of "separate government" with the desire for the unified independent and sovereign state, are still burning the hearts of the popular masses, it said.
					
					 The statement stressed the need to inherit the spirit of the uprisers and hold higher the banner of the June 15 joint declaration to stand against the U.S. imperialists and the sycophantic traitors who are getting hell-bent on the anti-DPRK confrontation while seeking to bring the dark clouds of a nuclear war to this land.

articles.title: Struggle of WPK and Korean People Supported
articles.content:
Struggle of WPK and Korean People Supported
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Nine political parties and organizations of Mexico released a joint statement on April 2 to mark the 17th publication anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country". Among them were the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association.
					 The statement described as an immortal great programme for reunification the 10-point programme which carries the President's noble patriotic intention to open the gate to national reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans.
					
					It expressed full support and solidarity with the steadfast stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to improve the north-south relations and hasten national reunification on the basis of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration provided by General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It charged that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities recently staged joint military exercises against the DPRK by mobilizing huge aggression armed forces and that the south Korean authorities are getting hell-bent on the inter-Korean confrontation in collusion with foreign forces after totally denying the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It called upon all the political parties, governments and organizations of the world wishing for peace, stability and reunification of the Korean Peninsula to fully support the WPK and the Korean people in the struggle to meet all sorts of challenges of the separatist forces and achieve the independent reunification of the country under the banner of the inter-Korean declarations according to the 10-point programme.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Thailand and Egypt issued bulletins on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association said in an article titled "President Kim Il Sung will always live in the hearts of humankind" on April 3:
					
					 Whenever greeting the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, not only the Korean people but also the world progressives recollect his noble life and immortal feats in the humblest reverence.
					
					 The international public is always longing for him as he founded the immortal Juche idea indicating the most correct way for hewing out the destiny of man.
					
					 He is a great sage in the 20th century whom humankind is boundlessly praising.
					
					 The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association said in an article titled "Sun of Juche" on April 1:
					
					 The sun brightens the universe with unlimited light and raises and protects all things with warm heat and tremendous gravitation. It is Kim Il Sung whom the humankind highly praise as the sun.
					
					 He brightly showed the road ahead of humankind with the rays of Juche and built Korean-style socialism, an embodiment of the Juche idea, thus bringing the bright future to the progressive people.
					
					 He will always live as the sun of humankind and the sun of Juche as he indicated the rosy future for the progressive people.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lauded in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lauded in Mexico
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, made public a statement on April 1 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The statement noted with high appreciation that Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, wisely led the drive to build a prosperous and powerful nation and strengthen socialism and founded the original Juche idea on the basis of the deep penetration into the practical requirements of the Korean revolution.
					
					 It referred to the fact that the DPRK has defended and advanced socialism under the Songun politics based on the Juche idea.
					
					 It expressed firm belief that the Korean people would certainly translate Kim Il Sung's behests for national reunification into reality under the wise and energetic leadership of General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il holding high the banner of the Juche idea and Songun.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Seminars, lectures and film shows were held in Mongolia, India and Thailand on April 1 and 2 to commemorate the Day of the Sun, the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the 78th anniversary of the foundation of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					Displayed in their venues were photos on the revolutionary history and undying feats of President
						 Kim Il Sung and books on the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The executive chairperson of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development in her report at the seminar said that the Koreans and the world people hold Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the sun because he brightly showed the road ahead of mankind in the era of independence with the highest level of light, heat and gravitation, properties of the sun.
					
					 Kim Il Sung is a great philosopher and the prominent leader who founded the immortal Juche idea and led the DPRK to victory, she said, stressing that he is always alive, enjoying reverence from the world people.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India in a lecture noted that the politico-ideological and military technical power of the KPA has been enhanced in every way under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The KPA led by Kim Jong Il will as ever demonstrate its might as the invincible army, he stressed.

articles.title: Segunda sesion de 12 legislatura de la APS de la RPDC
articles.content:
Segunda sesion de 12 legislatura de la APS de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 9 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la segunda sesion de la docena legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En ella participaron los diputados a la APS.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en calidad de observador los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios, organismos centrales y de los dominios de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion.
					
					La sesion discutio los siguientes puntos de la agenda:
					
					1. "Sobre las labores del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC para el 98 (2009) de la Era Juche y las tareas para el 99 (2010) de la Era Juche".
					
					2. "Sobre el balance de ejecucion del presupuesto estatal de la RPDC para el 98 (2009) de la Era Juche y el presupuesto estatal para el 99 (2010) de la Era Juche".
					
					3. "Sobre la  aprobacion de la ley de la APS de la RPDC 'Sobre la enmienda de unos articulos de la Constitucion Socialista de la RPDC'".
					
					4. "El Problema de Organizacion".
					
					En el informe sobre el primer punto de la agenda el diputado Kim Yong Il, primer ministro del CM, dijo que en el ano pasado, gracias a la movilizacion general del indoblegable poderio espiritual de todos los habitantes del pais y la potencialidad productiva fue aumentado considerablemente el valor total de produccion industrial en comparacion con 2008.
					
					Enfatizo que este ano, al volver a dar acicate a la industria ligera y la agricultura, hay que incrementar de manera vertiginosa la produccion de articulos de consumo popular y de cereales, activar la produccion en su conjunto anteponiendo con seguridad la de electricidad, carbon y materiales de hierro y acero y el transporte ferroviario y, al mismo tiempo desarrollar con energia la batalla de gran auge poniendo en su centro la aceleracion de la reconstruccion tecnica y la modernizacion de la economia nacional.
					
					En el informe sobre el segundo punto de la agenda el diputado Pak Su Gil, vicepremier del CM y ministro de Finanzas, dijo que en el ano pasado el ingreso del presupuesto estatal se cumplio 101.7% y el egreso del presupuesto estatal se ejecuto 99.8%.
					
					Continuo que este ano el plan del ingreso del presupuesto estatal se incrementara a 106.3% y el plan de egreso del presupuesto estatal, a 108.3%.
					
					En la ocasion los oradores senalaron que se balancearon correctamente las labores del CM y la ejecucion del presupuesto estatal para el ano pasado, se presentaron claramente las tareas para este ano y se trazo justamente el presupuesto estatal y expresaron entero apoyo y aprobacion al respecto.
					
					Manifestaron decisiones de realizar con brillantez el proposito y el proyecto del partido de consolidar por todos los medios el poderio politico-militar del pais y lograr un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo en este ano significativo del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del partido. 
					
					En la sesion fueron aprobadas la resolucion de la APS de la RPDC: "Sobre la ratificacion del informe de las labores del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC y el balance de la ejecucion del presupuesto estatal para el 98 (2009) de la Era Juche" y la ley de la APS de la RPDC: "Sobre el presupuesto estatal de la RPDC para el 99 (2010) de la Era Juche".
					
					Fue aprobada la ley de la APS de la RPDC "Sobre la enmienda de unos articulos de la Constitucion Socialista de la RPDC".
					
					La sesion cubrio la vacancia de secretario del Presidium de la APS con el diputado Pyon Yong Rip y nombro al diputado Jang Pyong Gyu como presidente de la Fiscalia Suprema.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il presenta informe sobre el balance de trabajo del CM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il presenta informe sobre el balance de trabajo del CM
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ATCC) -- En el segundo periodo de sesiones de la duodecima legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, que tuvo lugar este viernes, el diputado Kim Yong Il, primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, presento el informe sobre el balance de trabajo del CM de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el 98 (2009) de la Era Juche y las tareas para el 99 (2010) de la Era Juche.
					El ano pasado, bajo la direccion del Songun del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, se registraron uno tras otro los eventos admirables que comprueban el gran poderio politico, militar y economico de la RPDC y se realizaron los ideales que abrigaba nuestro pueblo superando toda clase de dificultades y pruebas, comenzo el informante y continuo:
					
					En el fragor de las dinamicas campanas de 150 y 100 dias han sido manifestados el indoblegable poderio espiritual de los habitantes de todo el pais y la potencialidad productiva, gracias a lo cual se aumento considerablemente la produccion industrial bruta en comparacion con el ano 2008.
					
					El avance trascendental en la labor para la jucheanizacion de la economia nacional deviene uno de los exitos mas importantes logrados en la construccion economica del ano pasado.
					
					Se ha completado el sistema de produccion del acero Juche y se produjo en avalancha el vinalon, fibra Juche.
					
					Se amplio y se fortalecio la base productiva de la economia nacional en su conjunto, se aceleraron energicamente la modernizacion y la introduccion de la tecnologia CNC en los importantes dominios industriales y se lograron excelentes exitos en las ciencias sofisticadas como la tecnologia espacial, la nuclear, la CNC y la biotecnologia.
					
					Bajo la bandera del Songun, hemos avanzado a pasos firmes frustrando las necias maniobras de sancion de los reaccionarios imperialistas y sus seguidores con la fe revolucionaria, el indoblegable poderio espiritual y la voluntad de autoconfianza e hicimos de esta manera todo lo que decidimos y deseamos.
					
					  Este ano, el Consejo de Ministros debe incrementar bruscamente la produccion de articulos de consumo popular y de cereales volviendo a dar acicate a la industria ligera y la agricultura y dinamizar la produccion general anteponiendo con firmeza la produccion de electricidad, carbon y materiales de hierro y acero y el transporte ferroviario. Ademas, tiene que desplegar energicamente la campana para el gran auge concediendo mucha importancia a la aceleracion de la reconstruccion tecnica y la modernizacion de la economia nacional.
					
					 Al propiciar la normalizacion de la produccion en todas las bases productivas de los articulos de consumo popular, el CM aumentara decisivamente la produccion de los articulos de consumo popular como la tela, el calzado, la ropa interior, el alimento basico y articulos de uso diario y seguira impulsando con energia la reconstruccion tecnica y la modernizacion de la industria ligera.
					
					  Materializara estrictamente las orientaciones del partido de producir la revolucion en la agricultura, en particular, en el mejoramiento de semillas, el cultivo de doble cosecha, el cultivo de patatas y de soya canalizando a nivel estatal las fuerzas al sector agricola.
					
					  Al normalizar la produccion de las fabricas de industria quimica, producira y asegurara a plenitud la fibra sintetica, la resina plastica, el abono quimico, los productos agroquimicos, etc., y hara que los dominios vinculados suministren con responsabilidad los materiales y materias primas necesarios a la produccion de los articulos de consumo popular y de cereales.
					
					  El dominio pesquero debe incrementar decisivamente los productos acuaticos para que el pueblo se beneficie realmente de ellos.
					
					  En el dominio de acopio y administracion de viveres se debe normalizar el suministro de alimentos a los habitantes y en el sector de comercio, mejorar la distribucion de mercancias.
					
					  Se practicaran plenamente las politicas populares como el sistema de seguro social, el de jubilacion, el de reposo y el de trato preferencial a los ex militares heridos.
					
					 En las 4 ramas prioritarias como la industria metalurgica hay que impulsar con energia la ofensiva general de hoy por la mejora de la vida del pueblo registrando un auge productivo mediante la nueva velocidad de Chollima, "la de Huichon".
					
					 En el dominio de industria metalurgica se debe acelerar dinamicamente la reestructuracion tecnologica y la modernizacion de los procesos productivos perfeccionando el sistema de produccion del acero Juche y dando enfoque a la produccion del hierro sin coque y utilizar con mayor eficiencia la potencialidad productiva ya preparada.
					
					Hay que poner en pleno funcionamiento todos los equipos generadores en el domino de industria electrica e incrementar con vistas al futuro la capacidad productiva de carbon en la industria carbonifera, incrementar el volumen de cargas ferroviarias y consolidar la base material y tecnica de la rama de ferrocarril.
					
					Este ano, se hara producir un auge productivo en las industrias de maquinaria, extractiva, de materiales de construccion, y silvicultura y otros sectores importantes para contribuir mucho a la mejora de la vida del pueblo y al desarrollo economico.
					
					Se debe crear la nueva "velocidad de Pyongyang" en la construccion de los objetos importantes y viviendas para 100 mil familias dando inicio a la "era de prosperidad de Pyongyang" en la epoca del Songun.
					
					En todas partes del pais deben construir las ciudades pintorescas y aldeas ideales socialistas de la epoca del Songun y renovar el aspecto del territorio nacional.
					
					En el dominio de investigacion cientifica hay que desarrollar con rapidez la tecnica basica principal y la ingenieria de los dominios importantes y elevar la capacidad propia del desarrollo tecnico e invencion de productos combinando estrechamente la produccion con la tecnica y desarrollar con valentia las labores para conquistar la cumbre tecnologica.
					
					Es preciso ampliar y desarrollar el comercio exterior e impulsar de manera audaz en gran medida los proyectos de cooperacion economica y tecnica con el extranjero.
					
					En la direccion y administracion de la economia se deben mantener con firmeza los principios socialistas y solucionar con iniciativa en el principio de autoconfianza y rentabilidad todos los problemas que se presenten en la gestion economica.
					
					Hay que mejorar la educacion y la salud publica, producir la revolucion literaria y artistica de la epoca del Songun y crear el nuevo "mito deportivo" de la Corea del Songun en los juegos internacionales.
					
					Todos los sectores y unidades deben cumplir con anticipacion sus tareas economicas para participar dignamente en el festival de octubre con el orgullo de triunfador.

articles.title: Acerca de balance sobre ejecucion de presupuesto estatal para 2009
articles.content:
Acerca de balance sobre ejecucion de presupuesto estatal para 2009
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ATCC) -- En el segundo periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea efectuado el dia 9, el diputado Pak Su Gil, vicepremier del Consejo de Ministros y ministro de Finanzas, presento el informe sobre el balance de la ejecucion del presupuesto estatal de la RPDC para 2009 y sobre el presupuesto estatal para 2010.
					Segun el informe, como resultado de haberse ejecutado exitosamente el presupuesto estatal para 2009, el ingreso del presupuesto estatal quedo en 101.7% con un crecimiento de 7% en comparacion con 2008.
					
					Los ministerios, organos centrales, direcciones y complejos sobrecumplieron el plan del ingreso del presupuesto central y todas las provincias, ciudades y distritos del pais excedieron el plan del ingreso del presupuesto local.
					
					El ano pasado, el egreso del presupuesto estatal se ejecuto en 99.8%.
					
					En el presupuesto estatal, se concentro la inversion en el desarrollo de la industria metalurgica y, al mismo tiempo, se distribuyeron muchos fondos a los dominios de las industrias electrica y carbonifera y el transporte ferroviario.
					
					El desembolso sobre la rama de construccion principal se aumento en 8.6% en comparacion con el ano anterior y se incremento tambien el egreso sobre la agricultura y la industria ligera.
					
					Como resultado de haberse incrementado en 7.2% con respecto al ano anterior el egreso sobre el dominio de ciencia y tecnica, la tecnologia cosmica, la nuclear y la CNC conquistaron el nivel de punta y los principales dominios industriales de la economia nacional se pusieron sobre la firme base cientifico- tecnica.
					
					Se desembolso mucho dinero a la esfera de construccion cultural y el 15.8% del valor total del egreso del presupuesto estatal fue utilizado como gastos de defensa nacional.
					
					El presupuesto estatal para 2010 establecio el tamano del ingreso y egreso en el principio de mejorar la vida del pueblo reflejando la demanda politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de librar una gran ofensiva para alcanzar el cambio decisivo en la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					El plan de ingreso del presupuesto estatal para el presente ano se aumentara a 6.3% en comparacion con el ano pasado. Se preven un incremento del 7.7% en el ingreso por ganancias de las empresas estatales, fuente principal del ingreso del presupuesto estatal, y el 4.2% en el ingreso por ganancias de las entidades cooperativas, el 2.5%, 2% y 1.9% en el fondo de amortizacion de bienes inmuebles, el pago por el uso de propiedades inmuebles y las contribuciones para el seguro social, respectivamente.
					
					El plan del egreso del presupuesto estatal para 2010 preve un aumento de 8.3% con respecto al ano pasado. Entre ello creceran a 110.1% el desembolso para el dominio de la industria ligera, a 109.4% para la agricultura y a 107.3% para las industrias metalurgica, electrica y carbonifera y el transporte ferroviario.
					
					Ademas, seran asignados muchos fondos a la rama de industria mecanica e incrementados a 108.5% los egresos para el desarrollo de ciencia y tecnica necesario a las labores de investigacion cientifica y la introduccion de nueva tecnologia
					
					Ademas, se destinara en 106.2% el desembolso del presupuesto estatal en comparacion con el ano anterior para que se practicaran mejor las politicas populares que muestran la superioridad del socialismo a nuestro estilo centrado en las masas populares, y los gastos de defensa nacional se preven en el 15.8% del valor total del egreso del presupuesto estatal.
					
					Este ano tambien, se prestara mucho dinero como subsidios escolares y becas para los hijos de los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					A fin de cumplir exitosamente el presupuesto estatal para este ano, todas las ramas y todas las unidades deben trazar una emprendedora y realista estrategia empresarial y administrativa a base de la elevada potencia espiritual de las masas productoras y realizarla tesoneramente para que cumplan ciertamente el plan del ingreso presupuestario.

articles.title: MINREX critica el informe nuclear de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX critica el informe nuclear de EE.UU. 
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada en relacion con que Estados Unidos hizo publico el "informe de revision del estado nuclear", el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea respondio el dia 9 como lo siguiente:
					 El contenido del "informe de revision del estado nuclear" de EE.UU. publicado el dia 6 muestra que la actual administracion norteamericana sigue tomando las armas nucleares como pilar para poner en practica su estrategia de dominar el mundo.
					
					  El presidente Obama dijo que su pais no usara las armas nucleares a los Estados desnuclearizados que observan el Tratado de No Proliferacion, pero Corea e Iran se excluiran de la lista de esos paises.
					
					 Esto demuestra que el mantiene intacta la politica hostil a Corea de los primeros tiempos de la administracion Bush que solia amenazar a la RPDC con armas nucleares tras definirla como "blanco de ataque preventivo nuclear". 
					
					Al publicar ese informe, EE.UU. invalido por completo su compromiso estipulado en la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre, aprobada en las conversaciones a 6 bandas, de no atacar ni agredir a nuestro pais con armas nucleares o convencionales y volvio a enfriar el clima en pro del reinicio de las conversaciones que se daba a duras penas.
					
					 A decir del Tratado de No Proliferacion, este no era el tratado al que debiamos comprometernos por largo tiempo porque deviene una medida provisional para prevenir la proliferacion de armas nucleares hasta que el mundo fuera desnuclearizado.
					
					  Hemos retirado legitimamente de ese tratado pasando por los tramites legales dado que el se utilizaba como espacio de la creciente campana de EE.UU. para aislar y atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					  Hemos fabricado las armas nucleares no por la supuesta ambicion nuclear sino para disuadir el ataque de EE.UU., que fijo a nuestro pais como "blanco de ataque preventivo nuclear" y lo amenazo realmente con armas nucleares, y para defender la soberania y el derecho a la vida.
					
					 Hasta la fecha, venimos cumpliendo fielmente el deber que nos corresponde en la arena internacional como responsable portador de armas nucleares.
					
					La desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana es nuestra invariable meta. Lo mas urgente para realizar la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo es que EE.UU. pare sus actos hostiles que violan la soberania y el derecho a la vida en virtud de su politica de fuerza basada en la supremacia nuclear, retire su politica hostil a la RPDC no con palabras hueras sino con acciones y tome medidas destinadas a crear la confianza.
					
					Mientras continua la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., aumentaremos mas en cantidades necesarias tambien en el futuro las armas nucleares de diversos tipos para utilizarlas como fuerzas disuasorias y las modernizaremos.
					
					Tenemos suficiente capacidad para eso. EE.UU. nos esta dando la razon y la justificacion de ello.
					
					EE.UU. debe saber que ya paso el tiempo en que sus armas nucleares nos amenazaban y chantajeaban unilateralmente.

articles.title: RPDC es invencible bajo guia del General Insigne del Paektu
articles.content:
RPDC es invencible bajo guia del General Insigne del Paektu
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos insertaron en sus ediciones de este viernes los editoriales dedicados al 17o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 Con la llegada del Dirigente al maximo puesto de la RPDC se dio la garantia fundamental para continuar y desarrollar firmemente la original idea del Presidente Kim Il Sung sobre la construccion del Estado y sus hazanas y para llevar a feliz termino la causa de la revolucion coreana iniciada en el monte Paektu bajo la bandera de la idea Juche y del Songun, senala el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					 El periodo en que el Dirigente oriento a la RPDC asumiendo el importantisimo cargo de presidente del CDN resulta la imborrable cronica revolucionaria en que el defendio la arteria de la patria y la revolucion y abrio la nueva epoca de prosperidad mediante el Songun.
					
					  La orientacion del Dirigente sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun esta penetrada de sus incansables actividades para enaltecer al camarada Kim Il Sung como el Sol del Juche y Presidente eterno de la RPDC y para cumplir a cabalidad la causa de este de construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					Para el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea, el Dirigente es el simbolo del poderio de la Corea de
						 Kim Il Sung y de todas las victorias y su conduccion sobre la revolucion segun el Songun es la linea vital de la patria y la nacion.
					
					 Gracias a la guia del Songun del Dirigente y el gran poderio de autodefensa nacional, la RPDC avanza enarbolando la bandera de independencia sin vacilacion alguna ante la coaccion, la presion, las continuas maniobras de agresion, la brutal sancion y bloqueo de los imperialistas y otros reaccionarios.
					
					 Por su parte, el periodico Minju Joson subraya que la RPDC, que tiene al Dirigente en la cumbre del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, sera eternamente invencible y le esperara siempre el futuro maravilloso.
